content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I am open to hearing your offer. Please remember to only provide the rental price and not any additional details regarding the lease or utilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I think 500 euros per month is a fair price for this apartment. It is in the city center and has all necessary facilities nearby.
